channel.title: How do I add cache directory please help
channel.description:
I am Using Vengance-X Pvp 2 And i need to make a cache directory ive been told to add this :
public static final String findcachedir() { String s; String s1; File file; s = "c:/.YOURCLIENTNAME_Cache/"; s1 = ""; file = new File((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).toString()); if(file.exists() || file.mkdir()) { return (new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).append("/").toString(); } return null; }\
but it doesnt work if u could team Viewer me and help it would be appresiated

item.title: How do I add cache directory please help
item.dc:creator: @Master_CoderZ Master CoderZ

but it doesnt work
